org.platanios.learn.classification

Class LogisticRegressionAdaGrad.AbstractBuilder<T extends LogisticRegressionAdaGrad.AbstractBuilder<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.platanios.learn.classification.LogisticRegressionPrediction.AbstractBuilder<T>
      • org.platanios.learn.classification.AbstractTrainableLogisticRegression.AbstractBuilder<T>
        • org.platanios.learn.classification.LogisticRegressionAdaGrad.AbstractBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - This type corresponds to the type of the final object to be built. That is, the super class of the builder class that extends this class, which in this case will be the LogisticRegressionAdaGrad class.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LogisticRegressionAdaGrad.Builder
    Enclosing class:
    LogisticRegressionAdaGrad

    protected abstract static class LogisticRegressionAdaGrad.AbstractBuilder<T extends LogisticRegressionAdaGrad.AbstractBuilder<T>>
extends AbstractTrainableLogisticRegression.AbstractBuilder<T>
    This abstract class needs to be extended by the builder of its parent binary logistic regression class. It provides an implementation for those parts of those builders that are common. This is basically part of a small "hack" so that we can have inheritable builder classes.
